onClose.description: Callback triggered when the X icon is clicked

alwaysVisible.description: If `true`, the DismissableCard won't disappear if the X icon is clicked (can be hidden with `hide` shared prop)

header.comment: Card header content - extended from {@link https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/components/molecules/Card Card}

body.comment: Card body content - extended from {@link https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/components/molecules/Card Card}

footer.comment: Card footer content - extended from {@link https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/components/molecules/Card Card}

noDivider.description: If `true`, hide all dividers - extended from [Card component](../../molecules/Card/props.md#noDivider)
noDivider.comment: If `true`, hide all dividers - extended from {@link https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/components/molecules/Card Card}

noTopDivider.description: If `true`, hide the top divider, between header and body - extended from [Card component](../../molecules/Card/props.md#noTopDivider)
noTopDivider.comment: If `true`, hide the top divider, between header and body - extended from {@link https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/components/molecules/Card Card}

noBottomDivider.description: If `true`, hide the top divider, between body and footer - extended from [Card component](../../molecules/Card/props.md#noBottomDivider)
noBottomDivider.comment: If `true`, hide the top divider, between body and footer - extended from {@link https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/components/molecules/Card Card}

headerClassName.description: Custom classname applied on the Card header - extended from [Card component](../../molecules/Card/props.md#headerClassName)
headerClassName.comment: Custom classname applied on the Card header - extended from {@link https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/components/molecules/Card Card}

bodyClassName.description: Custom classname applied on the Card body - extended from [Card component](../../molecules/Card/props.md#bodyClassName)
bodyClassName.comment: Custom classname applied on the Card body - extended from {@link https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/components/molecules/Card Card}

footerClassName.description: Custom classname applied on the Card footer - extended from [Card component](../../molecules/Card/props.md#footerClassName)
footerClassName.comment: Custom classname applied on the Card footer - extended from {@link https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/components/molecules/Card Card}

headerProps.description: Custom props applied on the Card header - extended from [Card component](../../molecules/Card/props.md#headerProps)
headerProps.comment: Custom props applied on the Card header - extended from {@link https://cianciarusocataldo.github.io/mobrix-ui/components/molecules/Card Card}
